name: sessionscribe
description: Windows desktop app for session recording with live captions, PHI redaction, and DAP notes

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm -C services/asr dev" "pnpm -C services/redaction dev" "pnpm -C services/insights_bridge dev" "pnpm -C apps/desktop/renderer dev" "pnpm -C apps/desktop/electron dev"
scripts.build: pnpm -C apps/desktop/renderer build && pnpm -C apps/desktop/electron build
